description: Episode number 1 of Series "Prevention of Cross Infection". Illustrates the prevention of cross-infection by contact and the techniques of cubicle nursing of specific complaints. A specific case is analysed, showing the general precautionary techniques of "barrier" nursing, and the possible consequences if even a single rule is not observed.
